The fitness watch is IP68 waterproof, you can wear it when washing hands, in the rain(Note: Do Not use in water more than 100. 40℉, such as showers, saunas, spring, etc).
【Safe Guard Your Health】Advanced HR sensor for accurate and effective heart rate monitoring, helping you better understand your health and making a reasonable adjustment to your lifestyle. Automatic sleep tracking can monitor your sleep status (deep sleep, shallow sleep, awakening) and provide a comprehensive sleep quality analysis to help become healthier. You can view the summary of your status in the fitcloudpro APP.
【Overtake Your Expectations】The AGPTEK smart watch is compatible with most iOS 9.0 & Android 5.0 or higher smart phones version to notify you of call, text, email, calendar, and app notifications. The package includes:AGPTEK Smart Watch*1,TPU Silicone Strap*1, Magnetic Charger*1,User Manual*1. If your have any problem, please feel free to contact our customer service via your amazon account.

Product Description

How to connect the Bluetooth smartwatch to make or answer calls on the watch?

You need to download the APP from your phone’s APP store, turn on your bluetooth and open the APP, click “Add A Device” , then find “P42B” to pair it.

Android: After successfully connecting the APP, the mobile phone will automatically pop up “Pair”or”OK” in 5 seconds to request a Bluetooth call. It does not need to be set on the mobile phone separately. After the binding is successful, you can answer and make calls on the watch.

iPhone: After the APP is successfully bound, you need to open the Phone settings → Bluetooth on the phone, find Bluetooth named “P42B_Phone” in the list, and click “Pair”. After the binding is successful, you can answer and make calls on the watch.

Wwzzey smart watch is a best choice as an exquisite gift for Birthday, Christmas, Wedding Anniversary, Valentine’s day, Father’s Day, Mother’s Day, Thanksgiving Day and other special days etc.

Main Functions: Make/Answer calls, Pedometer, Heart rate Monitor, Spo2 Monitor, Sleep Monitor, Workout modes; Alarm Clock; Wake Up Gesture; Remote Camera; 150+ Watch Faces; Time Format; Information Sync; Reminders; Find Device; Sports; Weather; Music Control & Player; AI Voice; Breathe; Exercise; Game; Flashlight, ect.

Stylish Smart Watch for Women and Men

Package:

1 x IP68 Waterproof Bluetooth Smart

1 x Charging Cable

1 x User Manual

1 x Screen Protector

Wwzzey 1.7” Touch Screen Buletooth Smart Watch

Multi-function Smartwatch Fitness Watch for Android/iOS Phone:

Don’t missing any notifications

After connecting the watch with your phone, you can get calls, receive SMS and APP messages (Text, Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Twitter…), calendar, weather and other smartphone app alerts, and you won’t miss any important information.

Ai Voice

Connect the mobile phone Bluetooth, you can voice control the mobile phone to reply to the message, check the weather, etc.

The AI voice function making it possible to complete tasks without having to grab your phone out of your pocket book.

Camera Remotely

Just open the App on your smart phone and find the shake camera function to take a photo by shaking your smart watch, making it easier to record your happy moments with your friends and family.

Excellent Daily Partner

This fitness tracker watch not only can accurately provide 24/7 Heart Rate monitoring, calories burned counter, steps counter, sleep monitoring, but also many practical features, such as alarm clocks, weather forecast, music control, stopwatch, timer, deep breath guide, sedentary reminder, helping you have a healthier lifestyle. And it’s a good choice as gift for your friends and family.

A Variety of Sport Modes

Our fitness tracker has 8 sport modes： Basketball, football, swimming, cycling, walking, running, skipping rope, badminton. It can meet your daily exercise needs basically.

Long Battery Life

iOS Android smart watch is equipped with a 235mAh battery, just need to be charged for 1.5 to 2 hours, can be used for 2-3 days bluetooth call. And it Supports 20 days standby time.

【2022 Fashionable Bluetooth Call Smart Watch】Wwzzey smart watch allows you to answer or dial calls anywhere, anytime. Our bluetooth smartwatch come with fashionable appearance and comfortable silicone bracelet, fit your wrist well and more nicer and safety , easy to wear and take off, and you can adjust the length of the band. It is a ideal choice as a gift for men and womenin 2022.
【1.7 inch Full Touch Screen & Customize Personalized Dial】High texture metal watch frame with 1.7-inch HD full touch screen and excellent image quality design brings you a better user experience. And our smartwatch has more than 150+ different watch faces, you can choose different dials from APP’s market according to festival, your mood or clothes. And you can also customize your watch faces with your personal photos, new look for everyday.
【Push Real-time Information to Your Wrist】The smart watch with bluetooth call can connect to iOS8.0 and Android4.4 phone via Bluetooth 4.0, and you can answer or dial calls anywhere, and get calendar, weather and SNS (Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, and Twitter,etc.) notifications on display. It will be very practical when you are unconvenient to take your phone out or you don’t want to miss anything important.
【Multifunctional Health Tracking】This fitness watch can measure your steps, walking distance and burning calories precisely in real time, and can monitor your Heart Rate, Blood Oxygen (SpO2) and your sleep, and help you better understand your health and create a health plan. Moreover, the watch not only has alarm/breathing training/sedentary reminder/drinking water reminder and other functions, but also can control music, control a camera remotely to record your happy moments with friends more easily.
【IP68 Waterproof & 8 Sports Models】Our health tracker is completely dust-proof and waterproof, you can wear it in washing hands, walking in the rain, bathing or swimming and so on, it can meet your daily needs completely. And the fitness tracker also has 8 sport modes : Basketball, football, swimming, cycling, walking, running, skipping rope, badminton. Pick it to track your real-time data during daily fitness and make exercise easier.
【100% SATISFACTION OF AFTER-SELL SERVICE】You can easily learn how to use it by following our user instructions. Wwzzey offers 7×24 hours customer service and 12 moths after-sales service, support for replacement, and refund. Pls feel free to contact us if you have any issues. As a professional seller on Amazon, we are confident that we will not disappoint you.

Wwzzey is a professional brand for smartwatch. Bring trustworthy sports and health data to every customer and make everyone healthier!

From the brand

Modern Solar Spotlights

Solar Lights for Pathway

Solar Spotlights for Pool

Solar Landscape Light for yard

Longer Runtime Solar Outdoor Lights: With advanced monocrystalline silicon solar panels, our solar spotlights outdoor can reach a conversion rate of 21.5%, which is charged for 6-8 hours under the same light intensity, our solar landscape spotlights can convert sunlight into more electricity compared with others. So these solar lights outdoor can stay on for more than 12 hours at night without getting dark.
2 Adjustable Brightness Modes: Our outdoor solar spotlights can be adjusted 2 brightness to suit different scenes. Low Light Mode(12hrs) is suitable for garden, patio or yard. High Light Mode(6hrs) is for walkway, driveway or porch. And these solar lights outdoor can automatically switch by detecting the brightness of the surroundings. Light off at dawn, charge in direct sunlight. Light up at dusk, automatically enter working mode.
IP68 Waterproof Rating Solar Garden Lights: With durable high-impact ABS plastic, our solar landscape spotlights can not only reach IP68 waterproof rating, heat resistant, frost resistant, withstand all kinds of bad weather, but also have a longer service life, reaching 40000+ hours. They are much more durable than other less waterproof grade lights.
2 Installation Options & Quality Assurance: Our solar spotlights outdoor can stick into the ground with stakes, or mount on the wall with the screws included. There are 2 installation methods for you to choose.

Product Description

All-day Heart Rate Monitoring

The advanced built-in heart rate sensor will continuously measure your heart rate all day (every 5 mins). You can also manually track your real-time heart rate on your watch or intuitively check the heart rate graph in the app.

Fitness Tracker with Multiple Sports Modes

Accurately record all-day activities like steps, calories burned, miles walked, exercise duration. This watch has 9 exercise modes, including running, walking, bicycle, dynamic cycling, hike, climbing, treadmill, Yoga.

You can also activate GPS function of your smart phone and track the routes you have traveled during workout via the app.

Receive Notifications on the Watch

With the watch connected to the app, it will vibrate to notify you when your phone receives incoming calls, text, SNS messages from Facebook, Instagram, Twitter etc. You can view the messages or decline the calls on the watch directly. Keep you informed in time of anything important. (Please note: not support answer calls or reply message.)

Music Control and Practical Tools

Once the smartwatch is connected to your phone, you can use the watch to control your smart phone’s music (Skip, Play/Pause music).

This sports watch also supports 10 alarm clocks, sedentary reminder, stop watch, timer, breath training, menstrual cycle tracking and other practical tools.

Outstanding Battery Life & Adjustable Brightness Levels

When fully-charged, you can relax and enjoy up to 7 days extra-long battery life or 30 days standby time. This watch has 3 different levels of brightness, so you can choose a suitable level for different surroundings, such as in the sun or at night.

IP68 Waterproof Smart Watch

This smartwatch meets IP68 waterproof standard, which can withstand all your daily activities. You can wear it when wash your hands, run in the rain, or take part in intensive workouts. (Please note: It can’t track your swimming data)

Compatibility
iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or higher devices iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or higher devices iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or higher devices iOS 9.0 & Android 5.0 or higher devices No need App iOS 9.0 & Android 5.0 or higher devices

【Accurate Fitness Tracker with 9 Sport Modes】 This fitness tracker watch can accurately provide 24hrs heart rate monitoring, calories burned counter, steps counter, sleep monitoring and female cycle tracking. 9 sports modes are optional, including various outdoor and indoor activities, allow you to get the real-time stats during your workouts on the watch. You can also connect it to smartphone’s GPS to track all your workout routes and distance traveled during exercise.
【Smart Watch Compatible with iPhone Android Phones】- This smart watch is compatible with most iOS 8.0 & Android 4.4 or higher smart phones(Not for PC or tablet). Pair the smart watch to your phone and receive all incoming calls, messages, apps notifications straight to your smartwatch including Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Whatsapp, and more. (Please note: only supports receiving calls and messages).
【24/7 Heart Rate Monitor & Sleep Tracker】 This smart tracker watch will monitor your heart rate every 5 minutes all day; It also detect and track your sleep, and analyze your sleep quality automatically.(deep sleep, light sleep, and awake time). By connecting the smartwatch to your phone, the app will provide detailed heart rate chart and comprehensive analysis of your sleep quality to help you stay active and stay healthy:)
【Long-lasting battery & IP68 Waterproof Smart Watch】 When fully-charged, this watch can last for up to 7 days or 30 days standby time. With IP68 waterproof, this fitness watch can meet the waterproof requirements of your daily activities such as washing hands or working out in the rain with it. Whether it’s sweat or a small splash, just handle it with ease.
【Smart Watch for Women Men with More Practical Features】 This watch can fit for 6.2-9.2 inch wrist, suits for both women and men. It has many practical features, such as female menstrual cycle tracker, alarm clocks, music control, stopwatch, timer, deep breath guide, sedentary reminder. It’s a also very good choice as gift for your friends and family members to help them stay motivated all day!

GRV

Combining wearable technology with sports & health!

Previous page

  2. GRV is a company that mainly designs and produces wearable technology. Our products are exported to Europe and US. The main products are smart watches, Fitness Activity trackers and wireless earphones. We use the industry’s top technology and design and more scientific and accurate induction algorithms, to bring trustworthy sports and health data to every customer, so that every user can find suitable and trustworthy products in GRV.

  3. Suitable for men and women

    The appearance of the watch is versatile, and it is also very suitable for men with large wrists.

    GRV smart watches use the latest infrared sensors, which can read your heart rate accurately and quickly, and monitor 24 hours a day.

Warranty & Support

Price: $59.99 - $31.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:27:36 UTC – Details)

From the brand

How did we get our start?

We sold our first unit 8 years ago, and we never looked back. One year later, we decided to concentrate our efforts on one clear goal: being one of the best Automotive Lighting companies in the world.

What makes our products unique?

Unlike our competitors, who produce dozens of different types, we believe in focus. With focus come quality, innovation, and creating the best lighting experience possible to bring light and safety to our customers at night.

Why do we love what we do?

Every time a customer says that FAHREN Automotive Lighting is the best they’ve ever used, it gives us the drive to continue developing unbeatable products.

THE BEST CHOICE

FAHREN F6A SERIES

FAHREN F6A SERIES

FAHREN FX6 SERIES

FAHREN FOG LIGHTS

300% Brighter Than Halogen – Top Automotive Grade LED chips with 60W, 14,000LM per pair, 6500K cool white. Super focused beam pattern design provides wider and farther lighting range which is 3 times brighter than your original halogen bulb.
Over 5,0000 Hours Lifespan – Whole aviation aluminum body, unique hollow carved heat sink design and 1,2000RPM turbo cool fan provide super cooling ability, which ensures a longer lifespan up to 5,0000 hours.
10 Minutes Easy Installation – Almost 1:1 mini design same as halogen, perfectly fit into your housing and factory sockets without any modification, just plug and play.
CAN bus Ready for 98% Vehicles – Our bulbs work with 98% of vehicle’s computer system without error, while some sensitive models of Ford, Jeep, Dodge, Ram, Volvo, Lexus, Chrysler, Mini and etc may require additional CAN bus decoder to be installed.
Note – The filter system may not be 100% accurate or up to date, please check your owner’s manual or the part number on your original bulbs to confirm the bulb size. Refer to “how to pick the right bulb size” in our Product Description.

Fahren H11/H8/H9 LED Headlight Kit

All-in-One Conversion Kit

  • Super Bright – 60W, 14,000LM per pair, 300% brighter as halogen lamps.
  • Perfect Beam Pattern – Super focused beam pattern, no dark spots or foggy light, do not blind oncoming traffic.
  • Plug and Play – Almost 1:1 mini design as halogen, easy to install in 10 minutes without any modification.
  • CanBUS Ready – Work with 98% of vehicles without computer system error problems.
  • Adjustable Beam – Adopts 360° adjustable locker ring to ensure the best beam pattern.
  • Efficient Cooling System – Whole aviation aluminum body, unique hollow-carved heat sink and 12,000 RPM turbofan provide excellent cooling ability to ensure 50,000 hours lifespan.
How to Pick the Right Bulb Size?

  1. Check your owner’s manual, the part number on your original bulbs or search “automotive bulb look-up” online.
  2. Select your vehicle model in the filter system of the product detail page to double check the fit.
  3. Refer to the “Notes”. Such as:

  • “Notes: Low Beam Headlight(w/halogen capsule headlamps)” means our bulb fits your car as Low Beam only if your car comes equipped with halogen capsule headlamps.

Warm Tips:

  • The filter system may not be 100% accurate or up to date, if you are not sure about the size, please confirm with us before purchasing.
  • Our bulbs can function as Low Beam, High Beam or Fog Light as long as the bulb size matches.
  • Most vehicles take separate bulbs for High Beam and Low Beam function(total 4 bulbs), they may be the different bulb size which need to be purchased separately.

Specifications

  • Model: H11(H8, H9)
  • Voltage: DC9-32V
  • Power: 60W/Set(30W/Bulb)
  • Lumen: Up to 14,000 lms/Set
  • Color Temperature: 6500K Cool White
  • Lifespan: Up to 50,000 Hours
  • Waterproof Rate: IP 68
  • Operating Temperature: -45℃ – +150℃

Read more

Key Features

See Wider and Farther

1.2mm ultra slim design provides super focused light beam, effectively simulate the beam pattern of original halogen lamp and solve the problem of focusing unevenly, super focused and max light output provide a wider and farther lighting area.

360° Adjustable Beam

Fahren H11 adopts 360° adjustable locker ring to enable some models of Dodge, Ford, Toyota, GMC, Honda to finally obtain the best light beam pattern.

Upgraded Driver

Upgraded cooling driver with CanBUS makes it to be compatible with 98% of vehicles without computer system error problems. Built-in smart IC ensures the best temperature protection and headlight performance.

Superior Durability

Whole aviation aluminum construction, 12,000RPM turbofan and top LED chips ensure a longer lifespan up to 50,000 hours, excellent waterproof and dustproof performance make it your top pick for travelling even in extreme situations.

Product Description

Hear Rate Monitoring

Android smart watch with the latest built-in heart rate sensor, can effectively accurate measure your heart rate. Meaning you can know of pulse rate changes in real time.

Blood oxygen and pressure monitoring

Digital watch with the latest built-in sensor, you can measure Blood Pressure and see how much oxygen is in your blood. Check your health status at any time.

Music Control

Find and turn on music controls in your fitness watch for quick and easy control of your music (play/pause, next/previous song) during training sessions.

Sleep Quality Monitoring

The mans womens smart watch can automatically monitor and analyze your sleep quality in real time 24 hours a day, and accurately monitor the sleep situation for nearly 7 days.

Customize You Watch Face

1.69″ touch touchscreen, you can customize the watch face to enjoy a variety of cool watch faces. You can even customize the watch face based on your own photos or favorite pictures.

IP68 Waterproof

Waterproof watch is an IP68 waterproof standard, You can wear it while washing your hands or in the shower, or even while swimming.

Call and Mesaages Notificatio: Smart watch for android phones will vibrate to remind you when your smartphone receives call notification, SMS and APP messages (WhatsAPP, Facebook, Messenger, Instagram) so you don’t miss every message.
1.69 Inch Full Touch Screen: This smart watch for android compatible features a 1.69 inch TFT-LCD color display for outstanding HD quality. Zinc alloy case and silicone strap, make you more comfortable to wear. You can choose from140 + personalized watch faces, or set your favorite photo from your phone as a watch face.
24 Hours Health Monitoring: This smart watch for man women features real-time heart rate monitoring, blood pressure monitoring, blood oxygen monitoring, exercise recording and sleep monitoring, accurately records all-day activities such as steps, calories burned a fitness watch to monitor your health at all times.
IP68 Waterproof: This activity trackers and smartwatche is designed with IP68 waterproof rating, so you can have no worries when washing your hands or swimming in the pool.At the same time, this fitness trackers for women man has 8 sports modes include walking, running. cycling, skipping, badminton, basketball, football, swimming.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $59.99 - $39.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:40 UTC – Details)

From the brand

NYMPHY, established in 1996 which has its own factory. The brand was born with unique creations.

We believe in Details Make the Difference and our aim is that The Customer Is God. So we insist on using the highest quality materials which are friendly to environment.

Solar Spot Lights Outdoor

Solar Christmas Lights

Solar Garden Lights

Solar Outdoor Lights

Solar Landscape Lights

Outdoor Solar Lights For Yard

Solar Christmas Lights Outdoor are Waterproof, Frostproof, and Weatherproof: Using ABS high-strength material, these lights can work under -4℉~140℉. The IP68 waterproof rating allows the solar garden lights to withstand all kinds of bad weather such as rain, snow, wind frost, high temperature, etc. It is perfect for outdoor use! Anti-fogging design – can perfectly solve the problem of fogging on the lens, maintaining light intensity and prolonging the service life.
High-Efficient & Long-Lasting: NYMPHY Solar lights choose polycrystalline silicon solar panels, the energy conversion rate is as high as 20%, and the charging efficiency is higher than competing solar lights. Whether sunny or rainy, these can brighten your garden all year round.
Brightness Light Modes: Cool white light – Low light mode(20hrs)/ Medium light mode(10hrs) / High light mode(6hrs). The solar light panel can automatically detect whether it’s day or night using the brightness of its surroundings (no motion detection). It will automatically switch from charging mode to lighting mode. All you have to do is switch them to the “on mode” the first time you use them.
BUY “ONE” GET “TWO” – 2 In 1 Function & Easy Installation: These solar lights can function as a landscape light or wall light. Set up is fast and easy. Stick it into the grass using the ground stakes and use it as a solar-powered landscape spotlight. Or mount it on the wall with the screws included and shine light from above. See every part of your yard – even your dogs chasing a gang

Tips:

  • Before using the solar lamp for the first time, charge it in sunlight for 2 days.
  • Please be sure to turn on the switch before the first use.
  • The solar garden lights has a button switch. Press once – Low light mode (20 hours), Press twice – Medium light mode (10 hours), Press third times – High light mode (6 hours),
  • Make sure the landscape spotlight is mounted under direct sunlight, no shielded or eaves to block the solar panel. Otherwise, the lighting time will be shorter.

Authenticity verification with the Amazon app

Scan the Transparency code

When you receive your product, please look for the Transparency logo and code. You can scan it to verify its authenticity with the Amazon app

Authenticates the product

The app will display a green checkmark when a product has been verified as authentic

Show product information

The Transparency code enables you to view rich information about the product which you purchased and show you that the product is protected by Transparency by Amazon
